website_summaries.verdict: Tired of throwing out frying pans? This durable option from Le Creuset will make your life easier and save you money down the line.
pros: This PFOA-free pan features an easy to hold handle that doesn't get hot
It can go straight into the dishwasher after cooking, too
It heats up in a jiffy and can maintain a consistent, even temperature throughout
cons: It does have a PTFE coating and despite being one of the most inexpensive Le Creuset options, it's still pricey

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a new fry pan and decided to upgrade to this le crueset since their Dutch ovens work so well. So far it has done well frying, sautéeing and browning meat. Cooking eggs has proven to be easy and stick free. It had also been a breeze to clean. Time will tell if the non stick coating lasts since other pans lost their non stick coating with use. Am considering purchasing a larger size. There may be less expensive pans that perform as well, but I’ve been happy with all my le crueset purchases and decided to give this a shot.
customer_reviews.author: MarLu

customer_reviews.title: My All Clad Replacement Pan!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice pan!! Good weight, Nonstick moves the food nice as I shake the pan back and forth to flip. It is a shallow pan not deep which help flipping food. Easy clean up. This replaced my all clad. Had that pan for a few years and there was a perfect circle in the center of the all clad or wear. Contacted all clad and they said it was my fault and won’t replace it. Time to try a new company. I do own a few ceramic 9x12 Le Creuset which lead me to try this pan.
customer_reviews.author: G-man

customer_reviews.title: "Cutlery and more" sells Garbage! Beware
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of "light" usage the pan sticks and burns the food. I requested a refund through the seller *Cutlery and More* and the response was because itt has been over 30 Days no refund will be given. I dont cook everyday so that 30 day time frame is ridiculous. For the amount I paid for this garbage I could have easily purchased 3 cheap pans and had a better experience.
customer_reviews.author: GUILTY

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware, but the pan came dented on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cookware, but the pan came dented on the upper right side (bottom facing up). Very disappointed that it was damaged... but overall, the pan is great. It's light and makes cooking healthier because you don't need to use as much oil.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Girl

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: It got misshapen after 5 months of use. Never put it in the oven, dishwasher or under a boiler. Explain to me how a frypan can get misshapen? One side is completely flat. Buyer beware. Amazon wont do anything other than to direct you to contact Le Creuset.
customer_reviews.author: H. Durden

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick STICKS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to fry eggs in a “non-stick” pan on low to medium heat, no oil. But the EGGS STICK and break when I try to flip or remove from this expensive pan. I’m plenty angry and disappointed and will never buy Le Creuset again. I’d like a refund but have used the pan. Also, it doesn’t balance well on stove. The handle is too heavy and much set right on burner or it’ll tilt. Grade F
customer_reviews.author: Steven T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Another great Le Creuset product
customer_reviews.text: Le Creuset has a well-deserved reputation for quality. This is quite heavy duty, heats well and evenly, and seems to have a high quality non-stick surface. That said, the proof of the pudding will be to see how long the non-stick surface works well (even cheap non-stick surfaces work fine at first).
customer_reviews.author: Cam-WA

customer_reviews.title: Great frypan
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, only reason I did not give it five stars for value or sturdiness is that we have only been using it for a couple of months. We have spent a lot of money on non-stick fry pans in the past that last about a year, waiting to see on this one and then will update but so far seems like it will truly last. If this is the case then the cost will be well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Inside bottom not flat.
customer_reviews.text: Olive oil and eggs run to the edges inside the pan. The bottom has a slight crown in it that causes this. Stove has been verified level.
customer_reviews.author: Dissatisfied Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great non stick pan.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pan to replace a high end non stick skillet we used over the last 2 years. This one blows the old one away. Would definitely buy another and I highly recommend this one. Worth the extra few bucks over the other comparable brands.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn S

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for price
customer_reviews.text: The pan arrived warped (one side bowed in) and it won't sit level on the burner. It's definitely non-stick, but it's not a pan I will be able to use. Very disappointed, particularly in an item this expensive, with such a well-known name.
customer_reviews.author: MarthaC

customer_reviews.title: damaged
customer_reviews.text: Service said the price has changed, I can't replace it. I need to pay more for a new one. nonsense
customer_reviews.author: Yiting Lee

customer_reviews.title: My favorite kitchen frypan!
customer_reviews.text: Great egg pan, heavy duty and a dream to cook with. I'm looking forward to purchasing my next Le Creuset piece. I have the 9.5" and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sac7000

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, expensive but worth it if you are a serious cook
customer_reviews.author: Jean Noelting

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Frying Pan
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with this purchase. This pan is very high quality, easy to clean, and looks like it will last a very long time indeed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kessler

customer_reviews.title: glad we bought
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy pan that is a breeze to use. I thought it was too heavy at first - but really don't notice as I cook so not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: M. alston

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Received this for Christmas/b’day . (12/10/8”) Have had to replace many sauté pans (Caphalon, etc.) These seem a beautiful quality and clean well. Think they will work out well.
customer_reviews.author: Seano

customer_reviews.title: I live this skillet
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful skillet. It’s easy to use and easy to clean. I’ll definitely buy another one when this one wares out.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: This is my 4th Le Creuset pan in 5 years. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th Le Creuset pan in 5 years. Would recommend. Teflon shows its wear around 3rd year but still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Great product would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! I use this about five nights a week. Strong, sturdy and cooks food evenly!
customer_reviews.author: willow139

customer_reviews.title: Best Non-Stick Pans
customer_reviews.text: Pans are so easy to clean and a pleasure to cook with. Have to be sure to use a lower heat setting and non metal utensils. They are solid, sturdy but not too heavy. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: Patti B

customer_reviews.title: Nice size pan for One
customer_reviews.text: Nice size pan for making an omelet for one. The non stick works very well and the eggs did not stick so it was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Nice mid weight pan
customer_reviews.text: The first high quality pan I've owned in 30 years! Nice heavy weight pan. Cooked eggs beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Best non-stick pan I have ever purchased!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST non-stick pan I have ever owned!!! I do not put it in the dishwasher (although it is dishwasher safe) because it is so easy to wash & dry.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: Great pan, love it! Cooks evenly and great surface. Dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Best frying pan ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pan for a good friend who is an executive chef. He loves it, super nonstick, heats evenly, so easy to clean. Can't recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great frying pan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great frying pan! Non-stick ceramic surface so I don't have to worry about Teflon flakes or other chemicals. Very easy to clean which is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Parks

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I use it almost daily, primarily on an induction side-burner for searing and gentle, controlled simmering. Easy cleaning. I recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Pye

customer_reviews.title: No disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Best pan I ever had, so we bought the other sizes. Next on the list is the nonstick pot set.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Heavy pan with good nonstick surface
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan for my new induction stove and it’s nice and heavy which is what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Made in China, not what I wanted. I placed my order direct from LeCreuset’s factiry
customer_reviews.author: Angie Carter

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend you calling amazon customer service if you get the ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the same exact defect as "Gadget Girl" review from "April 11, 2017". Would recommend you calling amazon customer service if you get the item with the same defect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Using each morning for eggs. Works well and nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is sturdy and the cooking is going well.
customer_reviews.author: mont6732

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with my fry pan.
customer_reviews.text: I love this fry pan so much I bought it in 3 sizes and threw away all my old fry pans.
customer_reviews.author: N. Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Le Creuset Nonstick Fry pan is the best we have owned. Will purchase in other sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great nonstick fry pan!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best nonstick fry pan I have ever owned! Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: MarkD

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Even the beginner can handle it well!
customer_reviews.text: The product is just as good as its description! You definitely need a pan that lasts long like this!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Surface scratches even with silicone implements.
customer_reviews.text: Not very tough. I have at least a dozen Le Creuset pots and pans. All great. I thought I'd try the non-stick. Very disappointed! Used this pan twice with silicone spatula and the non-stick scratched. Surface is very fragile. Do not recommend. I also bought a Freiling Black Cube pan, which I recommend if you want great non stick and bullet proof toughness.
customer_reviews.author: Donald K Arday

customer_reviews.title: teflon coated aluminum pan
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but this is an aluminum pan covered with teflon. It may outlast all the other aluminum coated pans but I would have preferred a coated stainless steel fry pan. Because aluminum has been fingered as a cause of alzheimers disease and teflon does go into your food, I will only use this as an omelet pan and continuing to stir fry in my stainless steel pan. There may be other options if you order directly from France but anything in the states is going to be aluminum and their special coating is teflon in the US. .
customer_reviews.author: Filbert

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Had this pan for a few months now. Works great so far. No major complaints or compliments. The real test will be long term to see if this holds up. The only thing my wife didn't like was the long handle. It's longer than our old calphalon set. That kind of annoys her. I actually like the longer handle as it's easier to grab in our cabinet....so take that for whatever it's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin A Schmig

customer_reviews.title: A great skillet for induction cook tops
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our induction cooktop and it has worked flawlessly. It heats up very quickly and does not 'humm.' It has a nice weight to it, but is not extremely heavy. It is easy to clean and the non stick is better than expected. Even after constant breakfast use for over a month it shows basically no sign of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Stay away !!! Overpriced pan that warps from heat
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the photo, the oil makes a ring around the outer edge of the pan instead of spreading across it. When cooking with oil, food in the middle will not get any oil. As a result, I wasted $134 which makes me very angry. The pan didn't start warping until well after the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonite

customer_reviews.title: I love these pans.
customer_reviews.text: This pan is worth every penny. Easy to clean, completely non stick but you can still get some sear on it, durable, comfortable, and is not made with any harmful non stick coating.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Like any other nonstick product
customer_reviews.text: Like any other nonstick product, this is no exception, I’ve already seen thin line scratches on the pan. Don’t know how long it would last.
customer_reviews.author: K. Chiew

customer_reviews.title: Nothing sticks to it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pan. It is my go-to pan for everything. Nothing sticks to it and it cleans up super easily. I've had it for a year now and it does not show signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Stark

customer_reviews.title: Damaged but otherwise fine
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan but it came badly deformed. I didn’t send it back bc it’s good enough to use. This seller has merchandise that is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Truthful Buyer

customer_reviews.title: This pan has non stick super powers and I’ve gotten several compliments on the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the king of pans. Never did I think I’d see the day where I could not only successfully make fried eggs, but do so with almost no oil. This pan has non stick super powers and I’ve gotten several compliments on the quality of food coming out as a result of this pan. Everyone needs one of these in their kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Owned it and a smaller size one for a couple of months now, so far very good. I pretty much stopped using oil!
customer_reviews.author: Ostelia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very solid pan. The non stick surface is thicker than off brands. So far we are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy B

customer_reviews.title: This is our second pan from Le Creuset
customer_reviews.text: These pans are expensive but great! They last far longer than cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: David S. Neroda

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best investments I have done for the kitchen. It is important to buy materials that are good and healthy for cooking. Definitely a must in every kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Nothing sticks to it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pan. It is my go-to pan for everything. Nothing sticks to it and it cleans up super quick. I've had it for a year now and it shows no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Stark

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. Perfect size and it cleans easily. May need another !!
customer_reviews.author: Carol W.

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick
customer_reviews.text: This is the best nonstick that they've come up with so far.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little pan
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my induction cooktop! The nonstick cooking allows me to cook and eat healthy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best medium size fry pan
customer_reviews.text: Cooks evenly. Non stick surface works great. You can use metal spatula with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Jole

customer_reviews.title: Best pan I have seen for omelets.
customer_reviews.text: Get this pan! I think it is better than my All-Clad for durability and maintaining its non-stick quality.
customer_reviews.author: bvanlent

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: Great pan in a perfect size. I have it in a larger size too.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie G

customer_reviews.title: Had to return with dents!
customer_reviews.text: Mine came dented with gouges on the inside of both sides of the pan. I'm returning it and ordering another one. I have other Le Creuset non stick pans and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Yankee fan !!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: A long lasting frying pan
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement frying pan for one just like it that we already have. The first one is still in use, but after several years the surface gets kind of beat up as normal from seeing other people's non stick pans. We are more knowledgeable now in seasoning the pan after cleaning and hoping this will extend our usage even more. It is a well made pan that will take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Greaseflapper

customer_reviews.title: I love Le Creuset non stick pans
customer_reviews.text: nothing sticks. Very happy. I also got the larger 11" pan and I love it so much,that I use it only from time to time and maintaine it new. 100% recomandable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Le Creuset Toughened NonStick Fry Pan, 9.5-Inch
product_meta.description: Size:9.5"| Color:GrayLe cresset toughened nonstick aluminum cookware features patented, extra tough, PFOA-free, non-stick coating which is superb for food release. Resists distortion and warping and works with any stovetop. Comes with Le cresset lifetime warranty and standards for high quality.
feature_bullets: Nonstick surface is non-PFOA and triple-reinforced. Will not flake, peel or rust

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars213 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
